mapper.insert: insert into conference (id, user_user_id, book_detail_id, conference_type_name, call_start_time, call_end_time, thumbnail_url, title, is_active) values (#{id}, #{user_user_id}, #{book_detail_id}, #{conference_type_name}, #{call_start_time}, #{call_end_time}, #{thumbnail_url}, #{title}, #{is_active})
mapper.update: update conference set conference_type_name = #{conference_type_name}, book_detail_id = #{book_detail_id}, thumbnail_url = #{thumbnail_url}, title = #{title}, is_active = #{is_active} where id = #{id}
